sn48.115-124:1.5: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam uddhambhagiyanam samyojananam abhinnaya parinnaya parikkhayaya pahanaya pancindriyani bhavetabbani.

sn48.115-124:1.8: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam uddhambhagiyanam samyojananam abhinnaya parinnaya parikkhayaya pahanaya imani pancindriyani bhavetabbani”ti.
